Text: Scored a 1.6 on IMDB so....gotta be awesome!

Hell when it comes to Classic 50`s B Sci-Fi flicks...the lower the IMDB rating is, the better the flick!!

     Oh Ya, 

       A good friend of mine said that Attack of the Mushroom people was the scariest flick she ever saw as a kid. I would love to send a burn to her. You got it mate?

..but of course my friend, I'll up it pronto!

Cheers!
